definition: to obtain a certificate or license etc/(PRC) to obtain a marriage license/to marry
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: What did your wife say after registering ?
sentences.chinese: 你老婆領證後說的第一句話是什麼？

sentences.english: In addition to this. many couples now cohabit and don't bother to marry.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，現在許多戀人同居但並不急着領證。

sentences.english: Just what would taking a course for the license ensure anyway?
sentences.chinese: 僅僅靠上課領證就能保證這個？

definition: to get married soon after meeting (abbr. for 閃電結婚|闪电结婚[shan3 dian4 jie2 hun1]) (neologism c. 2005)
to lay one's cards on the table
to get married and have kids/to start a family
to come out of the closet/to reveal one's sexual orientation
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to snatch time/to rush/to hurry (up)/to seize the moment
blind date/arranged interview to evaluate a proposed marriage partner (Taiwan pr. [xiang4 qin1])/to be deeply attached to each other
to court/to go steady/to be dating
